SALES ASSOCIATE         Summary    Reliable and punctual Sales Associate who possesses an excellent work ethic and more than fifteen
years in retail. Areas of expertise include inventory, cash management, and exceptional customer
service. Personable Customer Service Associate dedicated to providing the highest level of customer
service. Outgoing, and efficient with the capacity to multi-task.
High-achieving Sales Associate offering an extensive background in customer service, sales, client
relations and merchandising. Self-directed and self-motivated team player who also works well
independently.      Accomplishments      Consistently exceeded daily sales targets with an average of $1200 in sales
          each day.  Routinely helped as many as 200 customers each day in a high-volume
          retail outlet.  Received 5 "exceeds expectations" ratings on performance reviews.        Skills        Cash handling accuracy          Strong communication skills
          Organized          Superb sales professional
          Time management          Flexible schedule

Accurately prepared cash deposits up to $6000 with zero discrepancies.  Assisted in managing day-to-day business operations, including selling various retail products by explaining unique features and educating customers on proper application of products.           in person and via phone.  Opened and closed the store, which included counting cash drawers and

          company brand.  Kept the showroom clean and maintained neat, orderly
          product displays.  Built customer confidence by actively listening to their concerns and giving
          appropriate feedback.  Balanced the needs of multiple customers simultaneously in a fast-paced
          retail environment.  Processed all sales transactions accurately and in a timely fashion.           performance goals.  Offered direction and gave constructive feedback to motivate team

story:
Here's their career story rewritten as a narrative:

After graduating from Oregon State University in 1982 with a Bachelor's degree in Community Health, this professional found their true calling in retail sales, where they've built an impressive 15-year career marked by exceptional customer service and sales achievements.

Their retail journey began in 2009, where they cut their teeth as a Sales Associate, mastering the fundamentals of retail operations - from maintaining immaculate product displays to handling opening and closing procedures. During this five-year tenure, they developed a keen eye for market trends and built a reputation for creating genuine connections with customers through active listening and thoughtful feedback.

Building on this foundation, they took on more leadership responsibilities from 2014 to 2016, where they not only maintained their excellent sales record but also began mentoring team members and contributing to the store's overall performance goals. Their ability to build strong relationships extended beyond customers to include peers and upper management.

After a series of roles that helped broaden their skill set - including positions as a Cashier and briefly as a Warehouse Associate - they landed their most recent Sales Associate position in 2018. Here, they truly shined, consistently exceeding daily sales targets by averaging $1,200 in sales and serving up to 200 customers daily in a high-volume environment. Their cash handling was impeccable, managing deposits up to $6,000 with zero discrepancies.

Throughout their career, they've maintained an unwavering commitment to customer service excellence, earning five "exceeds expectations" ratings on performance reviews. Their combination of business acumen, psychological insight, and natural communication abilities has made them a standout retail professional who can effectively balance multiple priorities while maintaining exceptional service standards.

This is the story of a dedicated retail professional who transformed their role from simply selling products to creating meaningful shopping experiences for customers while contributing significantly to their employers' success.
